name: Roaming Fortress
description: Roaming Fortress is a dynamic new mix of action, strategy, and defensive games that puts your fortress atop a massive Burdenbeast. Upgrade your fortress and crush the enemies that have defiled the Kingdom!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Core 2 Duo 3.0 ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800/Radeon 3870 Storage: 200 MB available space
